Dialogue.Page: Hello there, I'm _nebula! I worked on QSB with JohnCorby, and also did a lot of work on OWML.
Me, Raicuparta, AmazingAlek, and TAImatem were the original modders for the game, and together we made all of the original versions of the modding tools and infrastructure everyone uses today!
There was even a point before Echoes of the Eye released, that I was the only person still modding for this game... I'm glad to see how much the community has grown since!
it took me like 30 minutes to work out what to say here... i have a lot of social anxiety... i didnt expect you to still be here... um... thanks for stopping by!! (runs away)
